alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Northern Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 10:54AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO...LEWIS... WAYNE...AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1049 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Fair Haven Beach State Park to near Osceola and slowly moving south. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Pulaski, Central Square, Redfield, Selkirk Shores State Park, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Mexico Point State Park, Nine Mile Point, Battle Island State Park, Brewerton, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, Richland, Constantia, West Monroe, Palermo and Sterling. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 36. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
